title: Hypervideo-Integrated Social Problem-Solving Strategy Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic analytical skills for social phenomena and experience utilizing digital content
context.additional_context: Process where practitioners learn to utilize hypervideo's nonlinear interactive features for solving complex social issues, emphasizing collaborative case analysis and strategy development

learning_goals: Learners can analyze multilayered causes of social issues from three or more perspectives using hypervideo navigation features
Learners can utilize interactive elements within hypervideo (e.g., branching points, pop-up information) to propose two or more actionable strategies applicable to real-world cases.
Learners can synthesize insights derived from hypervideo-based scenarios into a comprehensive report through collaboration with peers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
